title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2103.7 - Miscellaneous provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2103.7 - Miscellaneous provisions

State Regulations
(a) The
corporation will be responsible for identifying lenders willing to participate
in the corporation's LLR program. (b) LLR program materials will be made
available to any eligible student enrolled in an eligible participating
institution of higher education located in New York State. (c) The corporation shall establish
processing procedures and develop appropriate forms to effectuate the LLR
program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2103.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
